definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: The government decided to take measures to put a stop to political abuses.
sentences.chinese: 政府决定采取措施以煞住政治上的不正之风。

sentences.english: Persons in the know also revealed some malpractices at the fair.
sentences.chinese: 知情人披露了一些交易会上的不正之风。

sentences.english: We must reform the political abuses by every possible means.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须千方百计地煞住政治上的不正之风。

sentences.english: Indirect election puts an end to the possible unhealthy tendencies during elections.
sentences.chinese: 间接选举杜绝了选举过程中可能产生的不正之风。

definition: noxious winds, evil influences (idiom); malignant social trends
buying and selling of official positions
to fight corruption and advocate probity
to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)
lit. to grab feathers from a flying goose/fig. to seize any opportunity/pragmatic
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
lit. drain away filth and bring in fresh water (idiom); fig. dispel evil and usher in good/eliminate vice and exalt virtue
